short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of seeing cringe content on LinkedIn? This extension automatically evaluates every post you see.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing cringy content on LinkedIn? You are not alone.
This extension automatically evaluates every post you see and hides unwanted posts or replaces their content with a cringe-free version of it.
